author: cat.alucardo@gmail.com
name: CSS sleeper shift+c & shift+s
description: Disable CSS with button or key-combo. shift+S toggles 1by1 down the list of stylesheets. shift+C has a list of stylesheets split into thirds + a full + a empty and toggles between them. To not affect typing the buttons need to be in focus (click them once then key-combo), or if button isn't visible alt+c (Ex. youtube).
